text: Ngubani na intswelabulungisa egqitha abo bathintela ukuba iGama lika-Allâh lidunyiswe, likhankanywe kakhulu ezimasjid44 zika-Allâh, bade kananjalo bazame ukuzitshabalalisa? Bekungekho lungelweni kakade kubo ukuba bangene kuzo (ezi masjid) bengangeni ngentlonipho. Okwabo iya kuba kukuhlazeka kweli hlabathi, nesohlwayo esikhulu abaya kusifumana kuBomi oBuzayo
